item.description: Vishy Makthal is a comedian based in New York City. Born in Hyderabad, India and raised in North Carolina, he’s a South Indian from The South. He’s performed on shows across the country and abroad, having been featured in India and Europe, and has shared the stage with performers such as Ralph Barbosa and Seth Meyers. He’s also kind of tall.
